text: Madiha Yousri (), (née Ghanima Habib Khalil (); 3 December 1921 – 30 May 2018) was an Egyptian movie and television actress. She was born to a Turkish father and Sudanese mother in Cairo. She was known for her role as Siham in Immortal Song (1952). In 1969 she was a member of the jury at the 6th Moscow International Film Festival. On 30 May 2018, Madiha died at a Cairo hospital from heart disease at the age of 96. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Article about Madiha Yousri Category:1921 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from heart disease Category:Disease-related deaths in Egypt Category:Actors from Cairo
title: Madiha Yousri
